Question: However, this person regarded the passage of the Intolerable Acts in 1774 as "an Invasion of our Rights and Privileges".
Hints: Martha urged this person to advertise a reward for her capture, and the ad was placed in the Pennsylvania Gazette on May 24, 1796.
Dental problems left this person in constant pain, for which he took laudanum.
In pitched battles that were too complex for his relatively inexperienced men, this person was defeated.
